ComicInfo.Title: Vulva Girl
ComicInfo.Summary: When a worried mother fears that her son has been kidnapped to be circumcised, Miles Hastwick departs on an expedition to a remote East African village to search for the boy. Miles soon learns that Africa is a far different place than America, and even Foreskin Man will need some help if he is going to survive his most dangerous and complex mission yet.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-18 09:17:31. [CVDB303713]
